p: The induction of hepatotoxicity was done by following previous methods (Freitag et al. 2015; Okokon et al. 2017) with minor modifications. Induction was performed using paracetamol orally, with a single dose of 3 g/kg BW. Paracetamol was suspended in 0.5% CMC. Paracetamol suspensions as much as 2 mL administered orally on day 12.
